title: Latvia: First set of Supernova semi-finalists chosen
text:
Latvia: First set of Supernova semi-finalists chosen
The following four acts have qualified tonight for the semi-final of Supernova 2016, to be held on February 21st:
Justs - Heartbeat (Televoting choice) Catalepsia - Damnation (Televoting choice) Ivo Grīsniņš-Grīslis - We Are The Light (Jury choice) Marta Grigale - Choices (Jury choice)
This was the complete line-up of the show:
Paula Dukure - Look In The Mirror
ElektroFolk - Miracle Drums
Rūta Dūduma - Being A Friend
Ivo Grīsniņš-Grīslis - We Are The Light
Sabīne Berezina - My Inspiration
Edvards Grieze - New Day
Marta Grigale - Choices
Catalepsia - Damnation
Samanta Tīna - We Live For Love
Justs - Heartbeat
The jury consisted of Guntars Račs, Kaspars Roga, Ieva Kerēvica and Intars Busulis. The Supernova final will take place on February 28th and you can watch it live on Eurovision.tv!
